name: Mixaverse
description: What is the project about? Mixaverse is a Layer2 multi-chain metaverse platform that empowering a sustainable metaverse economy with Mixa-NFTs, Mixa-Coin, and Mixa-Land. What makes your project unique? Mixa-NFT is a digital image based on blockchain technology. It has multiple series, and each NFT in each series is unique. Mixa-NFT is not only an avatar or artwork but also a certificate for obtaining multiple benefits. Players can use it in multiple ecologies. Benefits include airdrops, combined mining, dividends, whitelist credentials, GameFi extended roles, and more. History of your project. Mixa-Coin is Mixaverse's core value token. Its primary goal is to decentralize the ownership and governance of the Mixaverse Treasury and IP Whatâ€™s next for your project? Mixaverse is developing various open blockchain games. In this open game world, numerous NFT-IP images can explore the Mixa game world together. MixaNFT can generate game characters in these games, and the higher its level the higher the NFT attributes. What can your token be used for? Trading, NFT, rewards, Play to Earn Game
